nodes.text: A battle at the planet Maridun was fought between the forces of the New Republic under Admiral Gial Ackbar and Warlord Treuten Teradoc's Greater Maldrood at Maridun in 8.5 ABY. After Teradoc encountered the forces of the New Republic and the Galactic Empire at Junction, he was forced on the defensive as Ackbar attacked his territory.
